title: OPPO F21 series launched in India alongside the OPPO Enco Air 2 Pro
content:
OPPO has officially launched its new mid-range smartphone lineup in India â€” the OPPO F21 series. The OPPO F21 Pro 5G is a rebranded version of the Reno 7 Z 5G, while the OPPO F21 Pro is a rebadged Reno 7. In addition, the company has also unveiled the Enco Air 2 Pro TWS. OPPO

The post OPPO F21 series launched in India alongside the OPPO Enco Air 2 Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OPPO F21 Pro 5G, OPPO F21 Pro and OPPO Enco Air 2 Pro have launched in India. Here's what you need to know.
